name.title: Platform Name
name.description: Name of the platform as it will appear in HomeKit

clientId.title: Client ID
clientId.description: Your Viessmann API Client ID from the developer portal. Must contain only alphanumeric characters, underscores, and hyphens. Get it from https://developer.viessmann-climatesolutions.com/

clientSecret.title: Client Secret
clientSecret.description: Your Viessmann API Client Secret (optional for public clients, recommended for production use)

username.title: Username/Email
username.description: Your Viessmann ViCare account username/email address

authMethod.title: Authentication Method
authMethod.description: Choose authentication method: 'auto' for automatic OAuth flow (recommended), 'manual' for manual token configuration (headless environments)

hostIp.title: Host IP Address
hostIp.description: IP address for OAuth redirect (auto-detected if not specified). Use the IP where Homebridge is running.

redirectPort.title: OAuth Redirect Port
redirectPort.description: Port for OAuth callback server. Must be accessible from your browser and not blocked by firewall.

authTimeout.title: OAuth Authentication Timeout (ms)
authTimeout.description: Maximum time to wait for OAuth authentication in milliseconds. Default: 300000 (5 minutes).

accessToken.title: Access Token (Manual Auth)
accessToken.description: Manual access token (only required if authMethod is 'manual'). Get this from Viessmann API manually.

refreshToken.title: Refresh Token (Manual Auth)
refreshToken.description: Manual refresh token (only required if authMethod is 'manual'). Used to refresh expired access tokens. Valid for 180 days.

tokenRefreshBuffer.title: Token Refresh Buffer (ms)
tokenRefreshBuffer.description: Buffer time before token expiry to trigger proactive refresh. Default: 300000 (5 minutes).

enableTokenPersistence.title: Enable Token Persistence
enableTokenPersistence.description: Save tokens to disk for persistence across Homebridge restarts. Highly recommended for production use.

installationFilter.title: Installation Name Filter
installationFilter.description: Filter installations by name (case-insensitive substring match). Leave empty to show all installations. Example: 'Main House'

installationIds.title: Installation IDs
installationIds.description: Array of specific installation IDs to include. Takes priority over installationFilter if specified. Find IDs in debug logs.

refreshInterval.title: Data Refresh Interval (ms)
refreshInterval.description: How often to update device data in milliseconds. Default: 120000 (2 minutes). Increase to reduce API calls and avoid rate limiting.

requestTimeout.title: API Request Timeout (ms)
requestTimeout.description: Timeout for individual API requests in milliseconds. Default: 30000 (30 seconds).

enableRateLimitProtection.title: Enable Rate Limit Protection
enableRateLimitProtection.description: Enable automatic rate limit protection with exponential backoff. Highly recommended to prevent API blocking.

maxRetries.title: Maximum Retries
maxRetries.description: Maximum number of retry attempts for failed API calls before giving up.

retryDelay.title: Base Retry Delay (ms)
retryDelay.description: Base delay between retry attempts in milliseconds. Will be multiplied by exponential backoff factor.

rateLimitResetBuffer.title: Rate Limit Reset Buffer (ms)
rateLimitResetBuffer.description: Additional buffer time after rate limit expires before resuming requests.

enableApiMetrics.title: Enable API Metrics
enableApiMetrics.description: Enable comprehensive API performance monitoring and health scoring.

debug.title: Enable Debug Logging
debug.description: Enable verbose debug logging for troubleshooting. Warning: May expose sensitive information in logs.

forceServiceRecreation.title: Force Service Recreation
forceServiceRecreation.description: üîß DEVELOPMENT: Force recreation of HomeKit services with new subtypes to refresh names immediately. Enable temporarily if custom names don't appear, then disable after restart.

customNames.title: üéØ Custom Names & Localization
customNames.description: Customize accessory names for localization or personal preference. Perfect for non-English users or custom naming schemes.

installationPrefix.title: Installation Prefix
installationPrefix.description: Custom prefix for installation names instead of using the full installation description from ViCare. Example: 'Casa Mia' instead of 'HomeName/ID 12345'

boiler.title: Boiler Name
boiler.description: Custom name for boiler accessories. Default: 'Boiler'. Italian example: 'Caldaia'

dhw.title: Hot Water Name
dhw.description: Custom name for domestic hot water (DHW) accessories. Default: 'Hot Water'. Italian example: 'Acqua Calda'

heatingCircuit.title: Heating Circuit Name
heatingCircuit.description: Custom name for heating circuit accessories. Default: 'Heating Circuit'. Italian example: 'Riscaldamento'

reduced.title: Reduced Program Name
reduced.description: Custom name for reduced temperature program. Default: 'Reduced'. Italian example: 'Ridotto'

normal.title: Normal Program Name
normal.description: Custom name for normal temperature program. Default: 'Normal'. Italian example: 'Normale'

comfort.title: Comfort Program Name
comfort.description: Custom name for comfort temperature program. Default: 'Comfort'. Usually the same in most languages.

eco.title: Eco Mode Name
eco.description: Custom name for DHW eco mode. Default: 'Eco'. Usually the same in most languages.

off.title: Off Mode Name
off.description: Custom name for off mode. Default: 'Off'. Italian example: 'Spento'

burner.title: Burner Name
burner.description: Custom name for burner status accessories. Default: 'Burner'. Italian example: 'Bruciatore'

modulation.title: Modulation Name
modulation.description: Custom name for modulation level accessories. Default: 'Modulation'. Italian example: 'Modulazione'

holiday.title: Holiday Mode Name
holiday.description: Custom name for holiday mode (7-day schedule). Default: 'Holiday Mode'. Italian example: 'Vacanza'

holidayAtHome.title: Holiday At Home Name
holidayAtHome.description: Custom name for holiday at home mode (today only). Default: 'Holiday At Home'. Italian example: 'Vacanza Casa'

extendedHeating.title: Extended Heating Name
extendedHeating.description: Custom name for extended heating mode (comfort boost). Default: 'Extended Heating'. Italian example: 'Riscaldamento Extra'

enabled.title: Enable API Caching
enabled.description: Enable intelligent API response caching to reduce API calls by up to 90% and improve performance.

installationsTTL.title: Installations Cache TTL (ms)
installationsTTL.description: How long to cache installations data in milliseconds. Default: 86400000 (24 hours). Rarely changes.

featuresTTL.title: Features Cache TTL (ms)
featuresTTL.description: How long to cache device features in milliseconds. Default: 120000 (2 minutes). Lower values = more current data but higher API usage.

devicesTTL.title: Devices Cache TTL (ms)
devicesTTL.description: How long to cache device information in milliseconds. Default: 21600000 (6 hours). Changes infrequently.

gatewaysTTL.title: Gateways Cache TTL (ms)
gatewaysTTL.description: How long to cache gateway information in milliseconds. Default: 43200000 (12 hours). Very stable data.

maxEntries.title: Maximum Cache Entries
maxEntries.description: Maximum number of entries in cache before cleanup using intelligent LRU strategy.

enableSmartRefresh.title: Enable Smart Cache Refresh
enableSmartRefresh.description: Automatically refresh cache entries before they expire (background warming) for seamless performance.

enableConditionalRequests.title: Enable Conditional Requests
enableConditionalRequests.description: Use ETags and conditional requests for better cache efficiency (if supported by API).

enableIntelligentPrefetch.title: Enable Intelligent Prefetch
enableIntelligentPrefetch.description: Predictively fetch likely-needed data based on access patterns to minimize cache misses.

compressionEnabled.title: Enable Data Compression
compressionEnabled.description: Compress cached data to reduce memory usage (uses gzip for entries >1KB with >20% compression ratio).

baseDelay.title: Base Exponential Backoff Delay (ms)
baseDelay.description: Base delay for exponential backoff algorithm in milliseconds.

maxDelay.title: Maximum Backoff Delay (ms)
maxDelay.description: Maximum delay for exponential backoff in milliseconds (5 minutes default).

maxConsecutiveErrors.title: Maximum Consecutive Errors
maxConsecutiveErrors.description: Maximum consecutive errors before platform stops attempting discovery.

deviceUpdateDelay.title: Device Update Delay (ms)
deviceUpdateDelay.description: Delay between individual device updates to be gentle on the API and prevent overwhelming the system.

userAgent.title: Custom User Agent
userAgent.description: Custom User-Agent string for API requests. Format: 'application/version'.

enableBoilerAccessories.title: Enable Boiler Accessories
enableBoilerAccessories.description: Create accessories for boiler control (temperature, burner status, modulation level).

enableDHWAccessories.title: Enable DHW (Hot Water) Accessories
enableDHWAccessories.description: Create accessories for domestic hot water control (temperature and operating modes).

enableHeatingCircuitAccessories.title: Enable Heating Circuit Accessories
enableHeatingCircuitAccessories.description: Create accessories for heating circuit control with comprehensive temperature programs.

enableTemperaturePrograms.title: Enable Temperature Programs
enableTemperaturePrograms.description: Create individual switches for Reduced/Normal/Comfort temperature programs with custom temperatures.

enableQuickSelections.title: Enable Quick Selections
enableQuickSelections.description: Create switches for holiday modes (Holiday, Holiday at Home) and extended heating programs.

enableBurnerStatus.title: Enable Burner Status Accessories
enableBurnerStatus.description: Create separate accessories showing burner status, modulation level, and statistics.

enableIPv6.title: Enable IPv6
enableIPv6.description: Enable IPv6 support for API connections (experimental).

dnsResolver.title: Custom DNS Resolver
dnsResolver.description: Custom DNS resolver IP address (e.g., 8.8.8.8). Leave empty to use system default.

proxyUrl.title: Proxy URL
proxyUrl.description: HTTP/HTTPS proxy URL if required (format: http://user:pass@host:port).

enableKeepAlive.title: Enable HTTP Keep-Alive
enableKeepAlive.description: Use persistent HTTP connections to improve performance and reduce latency.

layout.title: üîê Basic Configuration
layout.description: Essential settings to connect to your Viessmann system. ‚ö†Ô∏è Remember: Authorization codes expire in 20 seconds!

layout.title: üîë Authentication Method
layout.description: Choose how to authenticate with Viessmann API. Automatic OAuth is recommended for desktop environments, manual for headless/Docker setups.

layout.title: ‚öôÔ∏è Manual Authentication (Advanced)
layout.description: Only required if authMethod is 'manual'. For headless/server environments where browser OAuth isn't possible.

layout.title: üîí Token Management
layout.description: Configure token refresh and persistence. Refresh tokens are valid for 180 days.

layout.title: üéØ Installation Filtering
layout.description: Filter which installations to show in HomeKit to reduce API calls and improve performance. Can reduce API usage by up to 50%.

layout.title: üéØ Custom Names & Localization
layout.description: üåç Customize accessory names for different languages or personal preferences. Perfect for Italian, German, French, Spanish users or custom naming schemes. Changes require Homebridge restart.

layout.title: ‚ö° Performance & Rate Limiting
layout.description: Configure timing and rate limiting protection to prevent API blocking. Essential for maintaining reliable operation.

layout.title: üíæ Enhanced API Caching
layout.description: Configure intelligent API response caching to reduce API calls by 70-90% and improve responsiveness. Includes compression and smart prefetch.

layout.title: üéõÔ∏è Feature Control
layout.description: Enable or disable specific accessory types to customize your HomeKit experience and reduce API overhead.

layout.title: üîß Advanced Settings
layout.description: Advanced configuration options for fine-tuning performance, behavior, and compatibility.

layout.title: üåê Network Settings
layout.description: Configure network-specific options for special environments or connectivity requirements.

layout.title: üìä Monitoring & Debug
layout.description: Enable monitoring and debugging features. Disable debug logging for production use to improve performance.
